text: Proezas de Satanás na Vila de Leva e Tráz is a 1967 Brazilian film directed by Paulo Gil Soares. == Cast == *Emmanuel Cavalcanti ... One-armed Man *Joffre Soares ... Blind Man *Isabella ... Devout Woman *Joel Barcellos ... Catcher of Souls *Thelma Reston ... (as Telma Reston) *Zózimo Bulbul *Joseph Guerreiro ... Priest *Paulo Broitma ... title: Proezas de Satanás na Vila de Leva e Tráz
